text: John Hope Peddie, commonly known as Jack or Jock Peddie, (3 March 1876 â€“ 20 October 1928) was a Scottish footballer who played for various clubs in both England and Scotland, including Newcastle United, Manchester United, Plymouth Argyle and Heart of Midlothian. ==References== ==Other websites== * Plymouth Argyle club website biography * Profile at StretfordEnd.co.uk * Profile at MUFCInfo.com Category:1876 births Category:1928 deaths Category:Footballers from Glasgow Category:Plymouth Argyle F.C. players
